name: A Beautiful Sunday
description:
This game was created as part of the Games [4 Diversity] Jam that occurred the weekend after GDC 2014. The goal of the game jam was to raise awareness about the lack of LGBTQ+ and female presence in games. 

A Beautiful Sunday is a narrative-based game about spending a lovely Sunday with your significant other and then challenges of identity concealment that can occur after returning to work on Monday.

Created by:

Brittany Arnett, Brian Mcdonald and Joep Aben
